original_title: Beartales: The Adventure of Sammy Jay
overview: When Papa Bear and Baby bear jump in their magical airship for a one of a kind adventure, they tell classic bedtime fairytale stories along the way. Beartales: Bedtime Stories is a fun way for kids to listen to their favorite classic stories and drift off
tagline: Join these cuddly bears as they take you through the Grimm Fairytales
title: Beartales: The Adventure of Sammy Jay
